comments: nice professor. easy. study for exams and you\'ll get an easy A
Professor Melloy is the best science professor! Easy to understand & provides extensive notes. Study the PowerPoints for exams and you\'ll get an easy A!
Easiest Biology class you will prob take at fdu if you are a bio major!!! That being said just get an A in the class its really not hard at all

She\'s a good professor, very nice and helpful. Her exams aren\'t bad, she hands out possible essay questions, write out really good practice essays and learn them well, and that\'ll help you get through most of the test. Her labs were some of my favorites.
Very nice, very helpful. Overall great teacher.
